description:
compress/bzip2: don't panic on invalid input.

Fixes 5747.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM but maybe add test from http://play.golang.org/p/WI-rKRU4Ld ?



On Fri, Jun 21, 2013 at 2:16 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/10401050/<https://codereview.appspot.com/10401050/>
>
>
> --

On Fri, Jun 21, 2013 at 5:22 PM, Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM but maybe add test from http://play.golang.org/p/WI-rKRU4Ld ?

Have included the testcase in bzip2_test.go


Cheers

AGL

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=13e16bc02f6d ***

compress/bzip2: don't panic on invalid input.

Fixes 5747.

subject: code review 10401050: compress/bzip2: don't panic on invalid input.
